story.text: The player heads towards the lighthouse.
The player decides to approach the lighthouse.
The player also decides to investigate the docks.
The player turns towards the path leading to the lighthouse, reacting to the sound.
The player attempts to peer into the gloom of the lighthouse.
The player decided to end the story session. They were last peering into the gloom of the Old Lighthouse, having seen a faint, iridescent shimmer deep inside.
